DESC.PARA: The delete_bkg_model command deletes a background model from the stack.

LIST.ITEM: id - the id of the dataset; if not given, uses the default dataset id (id=1 by default, see "ahelp get_default_id")
bkg_id - the id of the background with the model to be deleted; default is the first background dataset

DESC.PARA: These commands are equivalent ways of deleting the background model for the default background associated with the default source dataset.
Delete the model associated with the background "bkg".
Delete the model for the second background of the dataset "src".

BUGS.PARA: See the bugs pages on the Sherpa website for an up-to-date listing of known bugs.
